title: Happy Happy Fun Time With An AFK
body:
Picture this: Normal Draft. I am the last pick. I am support. I like support. Smiley face

Team was rather poke and disengage. Needed sustain. Pick {{champion:16}}.

Our adc was {{champion:51}}, with {{summoner:7}} and {{summoner:12}}. Twas concerning, but alas, I believed. She even explained before I could say anything! "I don't wanna hear any bitching. This TP is incase I die, so I can tp back to lane!"

Game starts, and our wonderful adc tp's to botlane turret. Twas quite the site to see.

Fast forward 5 minutes. Oh No! A wild {{champion:20}} has appeared. I healed and I healed. I tried everything I could to save her, I really did! But alas, she fell to the clutches of {{champion:42}}, {{champion:20}}, and {{champion:44}} wonderful gems..... If only she had {{summoner:4}}!

Then it happened. She afk'd....... 

tl;dr {{champion:51}} + {{summoner:7}} {{summoner:12}} = {{item:3070}} {{champion:16}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: yeah I don't understand why people don't think they need flash. I know certain champions actually don't such as shaco for example I know it's viable to not take flash on a few others as well, but as an adc, even with an escape/dash you still need flash. The other day I was playing with a TP/Heal Jinx and she ended up dying to a gank, there wasn't much I could do, but all I was thinking was... "If only you had flash..." And flash would of most definitely saved her.

It's not even the no flash that killed me.

She said tp was in-case she died.

She died. She afk'd.

:X

As an ADC main, I ALWAYS take teleport. Mind you, I never take heal. It's {{summoner:12}} {{summoner:4}} , always. I like to be able to be in lane quickly, push turrets, or backdoor if need be. If I do take {{summoner:7}} , I never use it. And I generally have a support that can heal me anyways.
